answers.answer: I think drinking it any time from 30 weeks is ok. I drank the tea, had a curry and sex the night before I went into labour-also did good walks throughout and my little girl was born a week early! It's also good to keep drinking it after to help with healing. I am due to be induced a week early this time (3 Oct) due to gestational diabetes, but am still on the tea!

question: It is getting closer to October!!! Yay I can't wait to meet my baby find out the sex and hold baby! ! Not due till the end of October.  I heard lots on raspberry leaf tea and benefits when should you start drinking it? ? I have heard 32 weeks and 36? I am 33 & 6?
title: our time is coming!!
